meanings.definition: A person who is excessively concerned with following the latest trends in clothing and accessories.
meanings.sent1: The fashionmongers in the city always wear the newest styles.
meanings.sent2: She became known as one of the fashionmongers in her school.
meanings.sent3: The fashionmongers at the party were like walking mannequins.
meanings.sent4: The fashionmongers' obsession with trends was like a never-ending race.
meanings.sent5: The fashionmongers' influence on others was undeniable.

meanings.definition: To promote or sell fashionable clothing and accessories.
meanings.sent1: They fashionmonger their products through social media.
meanings.sent2: The boutique owner loves to fashionmonger the latest designs.
meanings.sent3: He decided to fashionmonger his brand at the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: She fashionmongers with passion and creativity.
meanings.sent5: Fashionmongering requires a good eye for trends.
